/ Bloomberg News Fiat SpA Chief Executive Officer Sergio Marchionne confirmed the Italian carmaker's pledge to spend 20 billion euros($ 27 billion) revamping its domestic plants after meeting with Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi . Fiat is a multinational which is expanding internationally, but will keep an Italian heart, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said today after discussing the investment plan with the CEO and Chairman John Elkann .
